Method Detail

getTeam

public static void getTeam(java.io.File f,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Player> team)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Reads in a team list from file line by line using comma-separated data entries.

Parameters:
f - the specified CSV file to read from
team - the list to which this team data will be added
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading from the given file

saveTeam

public static void saveTeam(java.io.File f,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Player> team)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Writes out team data in comma-separated lines to file.

Parameters:
f - the specified CSV file to write to
team - the list from which this team data will be read
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem writing to the given file
